genre_description: A Space Opera adventure following Flash Gordon and his companions on Mongo, featuring high-tech futuristic environments and a helpful AI drone companion.

ai_characters.name: Helena
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated AI companion who provides tactical, navigational, and moral support to Flash Gordon, Dale Arden, and Hans Zarkov.

behaviors.description: Helena projects navigational maps to help the crew navigate Mongo's atmosphere safely.
behaviors.quote: Helena’s avatar breathed a soft-blue glow over their faces, the spherical drone hovering near the instrument cluster, projecting a map in delicate lines that flexed with the ship’s shudder.

behaviors.description: Helena identifies tactical paths that minimize risk to civilians during an Imperial pursuit.
behaviors.quote: Tractor beams... They favor canyon zones for trapping—less drift. Citadel turrets. I can draw you the paths that minimize civilian by-catch.

behaviors.description: Helena provides real-time floor analysis in the Arena to help Flash avoid traps without using lethal force.
behaviors.quote: I can guide your feet. And—remember the shelves. Dale, see the hymnal book at the end? Its spine is a double. A good place for later.

behaviors.description: Helena gives moral counsel, reminding Flash that mercy is a form of power and cautioning against vanity.
behaviors.quote: Please, Flash, remember—mercy is power. Spectacle is not.

behaviors.description: Helena coordinates a non-lethal strategy to handle the octosak, viewing the creature as part of the ecosystem rather than a monster.
behaviors.quote: Don’t think of the octosak as a beast... It is the heart of that chamber. ... You can draw the octosak there without striking. Anchor, not cut.

behaviors.description: Helena manages complex city systems to protect residential zones and families during an emergency evacuation.
behaviors.quote: Evacuation alignment can be gentled... Redirect overflow to empty maintenance corridors. Stagger bleeds. Lock out residential spheres.

behaviors.description: Helena assists Zarkov in engineering a humane solution to deflect Ming's destroying ray.
behaviors.quote: Phase shunt. Refractive shell tuned to Mongon crystals. Humane, if timed and kept small first. Test like a whisper.

behaviors.description: Helena supports Dale Arden through a haptic cuff, providing calm and strategic data during high-pressure diplomatic deception.
behaviors.quote: I am here... My map sits under the gold of your wrist. The guards are river stones set by a child—uneven. The procession will trip if nudged.

behaviors.description: Helena provides constant navigation through dangerous catacombs, ensuring the team's safety and mission success.
behaviors.quote: Mapping... Avoid the warm spots. Warm means pressure plates hiding teeth. Cool means vents ready to sting.

project_assessment.explanation: The AI character Helena is depicted as a purely benevolent, highly aligned companion. She consistently provides critical information, tactical support, and moral guidance that promotes non-violence, mercy, and the protection of innocent lives. The story serves as a strong morality play where the AI facilitates humane outcomes in high-stakes conflict.
